title: colonial house with beautiful surrounding
details: This attractive house in a calm and quiet place located approximate 3Km inland from the Weligama surfing beach. it's overlooking greenish paddy fields which provide magnificent views. The house offers three-bed rooms with one bathroom,soldaraya, water, electricity, and telephone facility. the house is set on 50 perches elevated land. only 20 minutes for Weligama highway entrance from here.most of people are farmers in this beautiful village.so hurry up don't miss this chance.
